rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: Dr. Jarrahi is the epitome of a mentor. He's approachable and keeps his lectures breezy and fun. This class revolves around group work, so expect to be doing a lot of that... But don't worry, he's an excellent facilitator. He's an amazing resource and a really engaging person.  I felt like I could turn to him for advice outside the scope of class.
